Comment 10: 
1. Why is it much better for the root directory in the tarball to include the version
string? It just makes it more cumbersome to install. (untar and then rename, instead of
just untar)

2. There is a top-level README file that refers to doc/install-source.html.

3. We suggest golang.org _or_ doc/install-source.html. What's the issue here?
